features: Scrubbing Bubbles Mega Shower Foamer Aerosol has a foaming, grime-busting formula and a wide spray nozzle and kills 99.9% of viruses^ and bacteria*
It's a disinfectant spray that works on contact to remove limescale and 100% of soap scum for a powerful clean that smells amazing
This bathroom cleaner is a penetrating foam with our widest spray and our fastest clean to quickly cover tough bathroom grime on your shower and bathtub
Effective bathtub cleaner, tub cleaner, tile cleaner and shower cleaner spray
This disinfectant is also available in adjustable trigger spray
body.description: When you've got the right product for the situation at hand, even the most overwhelming tasks become... well, a lot less overwhelming. Cleaning becomes simple, rewarding — and more manageable. Suddenly everything's under control.Scrubbing Bubbles Mega Shower Foamer is a foaming shower cleaner that makes it easier than ever to clean your shower. The wide spray powers onto the surfaces in your shower and clings for close to 4 minutes. The formula goes to work on contact, quickly cleaning soap scum and tough stains, so scrubbing becomes virtually obsolete. And its active cleaners keep your bathroom clean for up to four days. Just rinse and wipe away to leave almost any bathroom surface cleaner.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Scrubbing Bubbles Mega Shower Foamer Aerosol is a disinfectant cleaner with a penetrating foam that takes on grime wherever it hides and kills 99.9% of viruses and bacteria*. *When used as directed This household disinfectant spray is a great bathtub cleaner, shower cleaner, tile cleaner, and overall bathroom cleaner. Use this all purpose cleaner to fight grime on smaller surface areas like sinks, countertops, or around the toilet bowl as it delivers a fresh fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product Does All the Work...
reviews.reviewText: OMG; I have found the perfect product to clean my tub and tiles. All I have to do is spray wait for about 20-30 minutes wipe and my tub is sparkling like new. Fresh smell too. I don't have to work hard scrubbing any more.....I love this product. I highly recommend buying it. You won't be disappointed. Price is awesome...grab while you can at this low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough good things about Scrubbing Bubbles! This product has truly been a game changer in my cleaning routine.Firstly, the convenience factor is off the charts. The foaming action is not only effective but also fun to watch as it works its magic. Just spray it on, let it sit for a few moments, and wipe or rinse away. No elbow grease required!But what sets Scrubbing Bubbles apart is its ability to tackle tough bathroom grime with ease. Mold and mildew? Gone. Soap scum? Vanished. It effortlessly cuts through buildup, leaving surfaces sparkling clean and smelling fresh.I particularly appreciate how it reaches into nooks and crannies that are hard to clean with other products. The foaming action gets into every crevice, making my bathroom fixtures look brand new.And it's not just for the bathroom – I've found it useful in the kitchen too, especially on greasy stovetops and microwave interiors. Versatility is always a plus!Overall, Scrubbing Bubbles has become a trusted staple in my cleaning arsenal. It simplifies the toughest cleaning tasks and leaves me with more time to enjoy a clean and fresh home. If you're looking for a reliable and effective cleaner, give Scrubbing Bubbles a try – you won't be disappointed!Pros:- Effective foaming action- Tackles tough bathroom grime effortlessly- Versatile for various surfaces- Saves time and effortCons:- None to report!Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, Great value
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Doesn't accidentally bleach or stain. Removes what it is supposed to. 2 is always better than 1.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product. Works well, pleasant smell. Not overpowering. Decent price.
reviews.reviewText: Pleasant smell, not overpowering. Works well. Easy to use. Makes cleaning easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spray, leave it, come back and merely rinse (for tiled large shower space). Nice scent
reviews.reviewText: I learned about this product from several, very experienced, house cleaners. The original product smelled icky.... The rain scented product that I recently got, is fine. It is not so overpowering and it leaves a pleasant scent, and the shower smells and looks very clean.My shower wall tiles are white with white grout. My floor is a mix of stones and ceramic tile, with white grout. My shower was pretty clean (I had scrubbed with a different product recently), but I want to improve the color of the grout and keep the soap scum down.As the housekeepers do.... I sprayed most of the walls and floor and then let it sit 10 minutes. Setting longer is better per the housekeepers, but I was in a hurry. I sprayed and a lot of yellowish film went down the drain, even though the shower had been thoroughly cleaned just a few days ago (with a different product) and the shower had not been used since that cleaning. I then sprayed the remainder of the shower walls & floor, waited 10 minutes, and rinsed. Zero scrubbing. The shower looks and smells great.Professional cleaning people told me the first things they do when starting to clean a house is to spray scrubbing bubbles into the showers, bathtubs, and toilets, and they let that all sit while they do a lot of other work around the house. The last things they clean are the showers, tubs, and toilets, and so the scrubbing bubbles sits there a very long time when they do this. All turns out very clean and it is efficient, without a lot of scrub a dubbing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works well on my plastic tub! Does not destroy the finish on the tub!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I moved into an apartment that no one cleaned before I came in. The yellow tiled shower walls are lovely but were super scummy, crud all around built in soap dish, mold in the grout...a general mess. I acn say without reservation that Scrubbing Bubbles cleaned this mess and let my bathroom gently scented and sparkling. I sprayed as directed then I did scrub with a brush. While the scum was fairly melted, it did need some elbow greasse and hot water to wash it all away. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really appreciate the lack of bleach and the clean smell. My shower sparkles!
